title: Restaurant Waste Tracking System
summary: Data collection and analysis system for tracking prepared vs leftover quantities in a buffet environment, enabling trend analysis and waste reduction.

title: Technical Indicator Backtesting Engine
summary: Implemented technical indicators and a backtesting framework from scratch only using market APIs.

title: Trading Log Website
summary: Lightweight web app for recording discretionary trades and post-trade analysis. Posted weekly updates and calculated long term trends.
